description: Nikola`s main partner is Hinoyakoma. It is often seen perched on his shoulder outside of its Poké Ball. It battled against Pharrell`s Dusknoir where it proved to be a strong Pokémon as it endured a direct hit from Thunder Punch. It was a quick battle and Nikola`s Fletchinder won the battle against Pharrell`s Dusknoir.
name: Hinoyakoma (Nikola)
